New Time Tracking Web App - Homkora

Published: January 01, 2012

I have recently launched the beta my new side project Homkora.

Homkora is a time tracking web app that aims to be as simple as possible. I was not happy with any of the offerings I found so I made my own. It let's you make projects and timers. That's it. You can check the code out at github.

Sign up for the beta here. Try it out and let me know what you think in the comments.
